data.name: RUSH!!!
data.detailed_description:
Think you have what it takes to beat the RUSH!!!? Take on mind-bending levels, capture the flag and test your speedrunning skills in this precision platformer adventure!



Features
RUSH!!! Brings you a captivating pixel art style challenge that will bring out your inner nostalgia!
Movement may be simple, but the challenge is real! Overcome levels with precision to capture the flag
Test your skills, conquer each level and master the art of precision platforming!
data.about_the_game:
Think you have what it takes to beat the RUSH!!!? Take on mind-bending levels, capture the flag and test your speedrunning skills in this precision platformer adventure!



Features
RUSH!!! Brings you a captivating pixel art style challenge that will bring out your inner nostalgia!
Movement may be simple, but the challenge is real! Overcome levels with precision to capture the flag
Test your skills, conquer each level and master the art of precision platforming!
data.short_description: RUSH!!! is an action-packed, nostalgic pixel precision platformer. Manipulate your environment and gravity to flip your world upside-down, and conquer levels by capturing the flag. Ready to test your precision pixel skills?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: DualCore
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD4000
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: QuadCore
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 650
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
